name: Dr Marko Sjoblom
content: Marko is the former CEO of Vive Bank and Myjar, a second-time entrepreneur whose previous business lent 5 million overdraft style loans. He has a PhD in overdrafts and artificial neural network.

name: Dr Feyz Egriboyun
content: Feyzullah is the former CFO of Vive Bank and investment banking machine learning quant with BNP Paribas and Deutsche Bank. He has a PhD in advanced mathematics.

name: Puneet  Jasuja
content: Puneet is the former Global Head of Retail Banking Risk at HSBC in career spanning over 25 years with the banking giant. He has undergone executive level CRO-training program at HSBC.

name: Sean Morrissey
content: Sean is the former CEO of GE Money Bank, in six different countries. He has built and managed multi-billion retail bank deposit books used for overdraft and credit card lending.

name: Wan Chuen Lau
content: Wan Chuen is a former practising lawyer, consultant and a Financial Conduct  Authority regulator specialising in  ﬁntech, commercial contracts, banking,  M&A and UK regulations.

name: David Hopton
content: David is a former Director at the Bank of England. He was the Secretary to a G10 Governors Committee. He was also an executive at Banco Santander in the U.K. for nearly 20-years.
